segments.text: How much will my pay be , if you don ’ t mind my asking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would like to start you off at 1,500 yuan a month , not including bonus and overtime pay . We don ’ t give bonus every month , but we offer a semi-annual bonus . And you will receive two weeks paid vacation a year , as well . Does it suit you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , thank you . May I ask for an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We'll supply you with an apartment of two bedrooms and a living room .
segments.speaker: S2
